description: Allows the user to mark a target by touching them with their palm. Once marked, anything the user throws will automatically track and pursue the marked target regardless of distance or obstacles.

users.circumstances: Vander Decken IX is the current user of the Mato Mato no Mi

abilityReveals.description: When Vander Decken loses consciousness, his Devil Fruit powers deactivate, causing Noah to stop being directed at Shirahoshi and begin falling straight down.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Vander Decken falls unconscious after hitting his head, causing Noah to fall toward Fish-Man Island instead of pursuing Shirahoshi.

weaknesses.weakness: Power deactivates when user loses consciousness
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Thrown objects automatically track marked targets
strengths.description: Any object thrown by the user will pursue the marked target indefinitely.

strengths.strength: Can mark up to two targets simultaneously
strengths.description: User can mark two different targets, one with each palm.
